shareWithUs.name: ShareWithUs
shareWithUs.desc: A full-stack app for lending & borrowing items within a community. Built with the MERN stack.

shopMate.name: ShopMate
shopMate.desc: A smart shopping list app built with TypeScript, React (Vite), and Firebase. It helps users organize groceries, share lists, and stay synchronized in real-time.

cryptoApp.name: Crypto-App
cryptoApp.desc: A crypto dashboard built with React & CoinGecko API. Includes live search, charts, and local storage.

weatherApp.name: Weather-App
weatherApp.desc: An interactive weather app that shows current weather and a 5-day forecast for any city worldwide.

list.description: During my journey at HackYourFuture, I collaborated on multiple full-stack projects using React, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB. I also gained hands-on experience in Agile workflows and presented our final project, ShareWithUs.

journey.title: My Journey ðŸš€
journey.text: From 2015 to 2021, I worked as an Accountant in Iran. During these six years, I gained deep expertise in financial management, bookkeeping, and preparing accurate reports. These experiences shaped my ability to think critically, stay organized, and solve problems logically, skills I now apply to my career in software development.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.description: Feel free to reach out via email or connect with me on social media.

resume.title: Resume
resume.description: You can view or download my CV below.

journey.title: My Journey
journey.text1: My name is Samira Ahmadi. Iâ€™m 36 years old, married, no kids, and I currently live in Veenendaal, the Netherlands. I was born and raised in Shiraz, Iran, where I worked for years in finance.
journey.text2: A few years ago, I made a bold decision. I left my comfort zone and started over in a new country, with a new language, and in a completely different field: IT.
journey.text3: This journey of migration and reinvention taught me how to stay strong when everything feels unfamiliar, how to adapt quickly, and how to stay curious no matter what. These challenges didnâ€™t break meâ€”they built me.

learning.title: What Iâ€™ve Learned
learning.text1: I studied full-stack web development at HackYourFuture, a bootcamp for newcomers in the Netherlands. I learned JavaScript, Node.js, MongoDB, Express, and React, and found that I especially enjoy backend development.
learning.text2: One highlight for me was our final group project. I built the authentication system and connected the frontend and backend. It was hard at first, but I kept pushing, asked for help, and figured it all out step by step.
learning.text3: Besides technical skills, Iâ€™m also reliable, calm under stress, and a good communicator. I enjoy working with people from different backgrounds and believe in clear, respectful collaboration.

goals.title: Career Goals
goals.text1: Iâ€™m most interested in a full stack . I love solving problems behind the scenes and making things run smoothly.
goals.text2: My dream is to grow in a professional IT environment where I can contribute not only as a developer but also as someone who brings discipline, reliability, and kindness to the team.
